rows.label: xs04090100_MSG0001
rows.name: Mistress Goetia. These are Earth aliens.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04090100_MSG0003
rows.name:
Well, well, well... Seeing truly is believing, isn't it?
Who would have thought...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04090100_MSG0005
rows.name: She's not a Prone, but they're working together...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04090100_MSG0006
rows.name: Why would you do this? Why do you hate us?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04090100_MSG0007
rows.name: Hate? Human extinction is duty—our duty, as Ganglion.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04090100_MSG0008
rows.name: Ganglion? So that's what you call yourselves?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04090100_MSG0010
rows.name: Humanity is a blight...a great cancer, festering on the cosmos.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04090100_MSG0011
rows.name: Our job is to eradicate it![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04090100_MSG0012
rows.name:
Humanity is here in peace—
what gives you the right to destroy the Lifehold?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04090100_MSG0013
rows.name: Is that what you call it?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04090100_MSG0015
rows.name: And yet, so dangerous. You must be purged.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04090100_MSG0016
rows.name: This is our calling as Ganglion—the cause of the righteous![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04090100_MSG0017
rows.name:
Then you'll forgive us for defending ourselves
against your "righteous" cause.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs04090100_MSG0018
rows.name:
Well, this should at least be more entertaining
than stamping out the lives of your sleeping brethren![ST:wait ]
